      • modifyPartSaveSelected

        public void modifyPartSaveSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Selecting this will update the attributes to the selected Part, and switch screens to the Main Form screen
        Parameters:
        event - variable created to initiate the save method on the Modify Part screen
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when criteria had not been met to fulfil all requirements to create a new Part

      • modifyPartCancelSelected

        public void modifyPartCancelSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Selecting this will erase the input fields, and switch screens to the Main Form screen
        Parameters:
        event - variable created to opt out of modifying the selected Part, and switch screens back to the Main Form
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • inHouseModifyToggled

        public void inHouseModifyToggled​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Selecting this will ensure the part is associated with the InHouse parts
        Parameters:
        event - variable created to switch the flex label to 'Machine ID'

      • outsourcedModifyToggled

        public void outsourcedModifyToggled​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Selecting this will ensure the part is associated with the Outsourced parts
        Parameters:
        event - variable created to switch the flex label to 'Company Name'

      • initPartData

        public void initPartData​(Part part)
        This initializes the data for the Part being modified
        Parameters:
        part - variable created to populate the text fields with the selected Part's attributes
